recipe_name: Brussels sprouts with chestnuts and bacon
author: Trish Deseine
method: Steam the Brussels sprouts for 15-20 minutes, or until they are well-cooked but retain a bit of bite. In a frying pan, add the butter and heat until foaming. Add the bacon and fry until slightly crisp. Stir in the cooked sprouts. Finally, crumble in the chestnuts and stir together. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: 500g/18oz Brussels sprouts, trimmed,  75g/2½oz butter,  200g/7oz streaky bacon, chopped,  100g/3½oz chestnuts, peeled and cooked (vacuum packed is fine), crumbled,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
